name: Planet Seed (Keshy31)
description:
Planet Seed is a top down flying game. The player needs to fly to the target drop points before the timer runs out. You win by covering the planet with grass.

The game maps are procedurally generated, allowing for endless playthroughs.

This game was developed for the Game Jam for Science: Serious Game Jam #1. The theme was Better Together, and this game shows how we can work better with nature when it comes to saving the planet. The game aims to encourage people to plant trees in order to combat global warming and to provide a meditative play session.
